input_args.passage: 'Anthony Doerr | Anthony Doerr (born October 27, 1973) is an American author of novels and short stories. He gained widespread recognition for his 2014 novel All the Light ...'
input_args.claim: 'Citation adds that he was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio and has authored story collections like The Shell Collector and Memory Wall, and a memoir titled Four Seasons.'
